title: Informativa sulla Privacy - App Calcolatore Calorie IA Calkilo
description: Calkilo Privacy Policy - Learn how we protect your personal data and health information in our AI-powered calorie calculator app. GDPR and CCPA compliant.

content.intro: Welcome to Calkilo ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and services (collectively, the "Service"). By using Calkilo, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our Service.

personalInfo.title: 2.1 Personal Information
personalInfo.description: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:

items.accountInfo: Account Information: Name, email address, date of birth, gender
items.profileInfo: Profile Information: Profile photos and personal preferences
items.healthData: Health Data: Height, weight, goal weight, activity level, workout frequency, dietary preferences
items.authenticationData: Authentication Data: Information from third-party authentication providers (Google, Apple, X/Twitter)

healthNutritionData.title: 2.2 Health and Nutrition Data
healthNutritionData.description: We collect the following health and nutrition-related information:

items.foodEntries: Food and meal entries (including photos of food)
items.aiAnalysis: AI-generated food analysis and nutrition facts

usageData.title: 2.3 Usage Data
usageData.description: We automatically collect certain information about your use of the Service:

items.featuresAccessed: Features accessed and time spent in the app
items.deviceInfo: Device information (device type, operating system, unique device identifiers)
items.ipLocation: IP address and location data (if permitted)
items.cameraAccess: Camera and photo library access (for food scanning features)

items.paymentMethod: Payment method information (processed securely through Apple App Store and Google Play Store)

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use the collected information for the following purposes:

items.provideService: To provide, maintain, and improve our Service
items.personalize: To personalize your experience and provide customized nutrition recommendations
items.processScans: To process your food scans and provide AI-powered nutrition analysis
items.trackProgress: To track your progress toward health and fitness goals
items.calculateGoals: To calculate and display your calorie goals, macronutrient targets, and BMI

items.notifications: To send you notifications, reminders, and updates about your progress
items.customerSupport: To respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
items.serviceCommunications: To send you important service-related communications

items.analyzeUsage: To analyze usage patterns and improve our Service
items.developFeatures: To develop new features and functionality
items.research: To conduct research and analytics (in anonymized form)

items.enforceTerms: To enforce our Terms and Conditions
items.preventFraud: To protect our rights and prevent fraud

informationSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

serviceProviders.title: 4.1 Service Providers
serviceProviders.description: We may share information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, including:

legalRequirements.title: 4.2 Legal Requirements
legalRequirements.description: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.

businessTransfers.title: 4.3 Business Transfers
businessTransfers.description: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.

withConsent.title: 4.4 With Your Consent
withConsent.description: We may share your information with your explicit consent or at your direction.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information, including:

items.encryption: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
items.limitedAccess: Limited access to personal information on a need-to-know basis

dataSecurity.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights and Choices
yourRights.description: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:

items.requestAccess: Request access to your personal information
items.requestCopy: Request a copy of your data in a portable format

items.updateInfo: Update or correct your personal information through the app settings
items.requestDeletion: Request deletion of your account and associated data
items.deletionNote: Note: Account deletion is permanent and cannot be undone

items.disableNotifications: Disable push notifications through device settings
items.adjustSettings: Adjust privacy settings within the app
items.withdrawConsent: Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent

dataRetention.title: 6.4 Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide our Service. When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your personal information, except where we are required to retain it for legal purposes.

childrensPrivacy.title: 7. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.description: Calkilo is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete such information.

internationalTransfers.title: 8. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.description: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. These countries may have data protection laws that differ from those in your country. By using our Service, you consent to the transfer of your information to these countries.

thirdPartyServices.title: 9. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.description: Our Service may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties. We encourage you to review their privacy policies.

authenticationProviders.title: 9.1 Authentication Providers
authenticationProviders.description: When you sign in using Google, Apple, or X/Twitter, those services may collect information about you. Please review their privacy policies.

paymentProcessors.title: 9.2 Payment Processors
paymentProcessors.description: Payment transactions are processed by Apple App Store and Google Play Store. We do not store your payment card information.

californiaPrivacyRights.title: 10. California Privacy Rights
californiaPrivacyRights.description: If you are a California resident, you have additional rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA):

items.rightToKnow: Right to know what personal information is collected
items.rightToOptOut: Right to opt-out of the sale of personal information (we do not sell personal information)
items.rightToNonDiscrimination: Right to non-discrimination for exercising your privacy rights

changesToPolicy.title: 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changesToPolicy.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contactUs.title: 12. Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:
contactUs.address: Address: Calkilo Privacy Team, 123 Health Tech Street, San Francisco, CA 94105

dataController.title: 13. Data Controller Information
dataController.description: For users in the European Economic Area (EEA), the data controller is:
